## Problem set 1

![](https://github.com/ssufian/DAT-605/blob/master/Problem%20Set%201%20-%20Multiplication%20Not%20Commutative.JPG?raw=true)

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(matlib)
library(MASS)



```

- The special case where A$^{T}$A $=$ AA$^{T}$ thru an example (Identity Matrix) in R

```{r}
m <- matrix(c(1, 0, 0, 0,1,0,0,0,1), nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow=F)
m

m%*%t(m)

t(m)%*%m
```

- But in general, The regular case of A$^{T}$A $!=$ AA$^{T}$

```{r}

A = matrix(c(1,2,3,1,1,1,2,0,1),nrow=3)
A

A%*%t(A)

t(A)%*%A

```

## Problem Set 2

- LU Decomposition Function


```{r}


LUDecomposition <- function(A, n){
  nrow <- n
  ncol <- n
  U = A
  L = diag(n)
  p <- n
  
if(A[1,1]> 0) {
U[1,] <- A[1,]/A[1,1]
} else {
if(num == 0) {
A[1,] <- A[1,]+1
} else {
A[1,] <- A[1,]/-A[1,1]
}
}
    
 i <- 2
 j <- i
 while (j < p+1) {
   
  L[j,i-1 ] <- U[j,i-1]  

  U[j, ] <- U[j, ] - U[i-1, ] * U[j, i-1]
  j <- j+1
 }
 
 j <-p
 
 if(U[i,i] < 0) 
{  
   
 while (j < p+1) 
  {
  L[j,i] <- -U[j,i] 
  U[j, ] <- U[j, ] - U[i, ] *-U[j, i]
  j<-j+1
  }
 } else
 {
   
    while (j < p+1) 
    {
    L[j,i-1] <- U[j,i-1] 
    L[j,i-1] <- U[j,i-1] 
    U[j, ] <- U[j, ] - U[i-1, ] *U[j, i-1]
    j<-j+1
    }
  }

 print("L Matrix: " )
 print(L)
 print("U Matrix: ")
 print(U)

 
 print("To verify that A = LU:")

 Acheck <- L%*%U
 print(Acheck)

 print("Original Matrix: ")  
return (A)
  
}


```

```{r}

n<-3
A = matrix(c(1,2,3,1,1,1,2,0,1),nrow=n)

LUDecomposition(A, n)


```


## Manual Check if A = LU 

```{r}
AO <- matrix(c(1,1,2,2,1,0,3,1,1), nrow=3, byrow =T)

AO
UU <- matrix(c(1,1,2,0,-1,-4,0,0,3), nrow=3, byrow=T)

UU

LL <- matrix(c(1,0,0,2,1,0,3,2,1), nrow =3, byrow=T)

LL

AA <- LL%*%UU

AA 
```
